description: A deck of Zener cards, used pre-Catalcysm to test for psychic ability.

A small plastic device about the size of two smartphones stacked on top of each other, with a toggle on one end and "OS647-P" written prominently on one side above the XEDRA logo.  There is an indentation on the other side the right size to contain a matrix crystal.

use_action.description: Insert a black matrix crystal and flip the toggle.

description: A small plastic device about the size of two smartphones stacked on top of each other, with a toggle on one end and "OS647-P" written prominently on one side above the XEDRA logo.  Parts of the device seem melted and the toggle no longer moves.
